Question: How do I detect which kind of JRE is installed -- 32bit vs. 64bit: :During installation with an NSIS installer, I need to check which JRE (32bit vs 64bit) is installed on a system. I already know that I can check a system property "sun.arch.data.model", but this is Sun-specific. I'm wondering if there is a standard solution for this.
Please using this api: InputStream.read.
